description: Generates triangle with side len for educational visualization.
example_usage:
# Example usage for generate_triangle_with_side_len
result = generate_triangle_with_side_len(data)

educational_standards.description: Classify triangles as right, acute, obtuse, scalene, isosceles but not equilateral, or equilateral.
Classify triangles as equilateral, isosceles, scalene.
Understand the angle-angle criterion for similarity of triangles.
